#summary The lastest news on the project

= Latest News =
=== 11.10.2009 Added test app ===
To launch the demo application, whose purpose is mainly for testing, double click on gtkjfilechooser-demo.jar or type from the command line "java -jar gtkjfilechooser-demo.jar":
[http://gtkjfilechooser.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/GtkJFileChooser/site/img/FileChooserDemo.png]
The demo is completly based on the Sun Java FileChooserDemo in $JAVA_HOME/demo/jfc/FileChooserDemo.

=== 10.10.2009 Added Path autocompletion support ===
[http://gtkjfilechooser.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/GtkJFileChooser/site/img/autocompletion.png]
